title: Deno 1.5 Release Notes
author: Bartek Iwa≈Ñczuk, Ryan Dahl, and Luca Casonato
snippet: Deno 1.5 greatly improves `deno bundle` with support for tree shaking, and a up to 15x performance improvement. This release also adds the `alert`, `confirm`, and `prompt` APIs and improves the REPL experience.
